description: Two teenagers were killed by a no-warning car bomb blamed on loyalist paramilitaries in County Cavan.
title: Belturbet bomb: Taoiseach wants answers on 1972 attack
title_page: Belturbet bomb: Taoiseach wants answers on 1972 attack - BBC News
maintext: Niamh Smyth TD, a party colleague of Mr Smith, said it was "utterly wrong" that the O'Reilly and Stanley families had not been granted access to police files on the attack because, 48 years on, the investigation was "deemed to be live".
